Room.Name: Golden Dolphin Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Golden Dolphin Way, north of the City Walls.
Room.LongDescription: The omnimous City Walls rise up nearly ten meters, preventing just about any attack from the outside regions. Oceancrest has had a long history of wars and sieges, which is the primary reason the walls were built. As an additional benefit, it also serves as an ideal law-enforcement agent, preventing wanted criminals from fleeing the town.
